title: Match History Not Loading
body:
Hi All -

Some of you may have already noticed, but the Match History isn't loading properly at the moment. Even though it can't be viewed, rest assure that your games are still being logged and no data is lost here. We're still working on the issue, but as of right now, we don't yet have an ETA. I'll update you as I we find out more.

Some further updates may also appear [here](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).

Thanks.

replies.body: [Update] Match History should display previous matches again. It'll take us a little while to get the games you've played while Match History was down, but they should show up within several hours.
Thanks for the update! Looking forward to the new highlight system{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
